description:
Kyosuke is new in town and has an encounter with a mysterious girl, later revealed to be Madoka, a local delinquent and his classmate. Also, did I mention he and his family have psychic powers?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Transfer Student! `Tis Embarrassing to Say, but I`ll Fall in Love for the First Time
転校生!恥ずかし ながら初恋します
